languages.text: "О, человек он замечательный! Очень внимательный, щедрый... но, конечно же, почтенный возраст дает о себе знать. Порой у него случаются причуды. Да и у кого из нас их нет!"

traits.locale_text: "О, человек он замечательный! Очень внимательный, щедрый... но, конечно же, почтенный возраст дает о себе знать. Порой у него случаются причуды. Да и у кого из нас их нет!"

languages.text: "Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"
languages.original_text: "О, человек он замечательный! Очень внимательный, щедрый... но, конечно же, почтенный возраст дает о себе знать. Порой у него случаются причуды. Да и у кого из нас их нет!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"
"Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"
"Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"
"Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"
"Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"

languages.text: “噢，他确实是个相当了不起的人！他是如此体贴、如此慷慨……当然，他的年迈也确实对他产生了影响。他有时举止有些古怪，不过，我们每个人都有各自的怪癖，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，他确实是个相当了不起的人！他是如此体贴、如此慷慨……当然，他的年迈也确实对他产生了影响。他有时举止有些古怪，不过，我们每个人都有各自的怪癖，是吧？”

languages.text: «¡Oh, es una persona maravillosa! Considerado y generoso... pero claro, su venerable edad ya le pasa factura. De vez en cuando se comporta de un modo extraño. Pero todos tenemos nuestras manías, ¿no es así?».
languages.original_text: "Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, es una persona maravillosa! Considerado y generoso... pero claro, su venerable edad ya le pasa factura. De vez en cuando se comporta de un modo extraño. Pero todos tenemos nuestras manías, ¿no es así?».

languages.text: "Harika bir insandır! Çok düşünceli ve cömerttir... Tabii ki saygıdeğer yaşlılığı onu yıpratıyor. Zaman zaman garip davranıyor. Gelgelelim hepimizin tuhaflıkları yok mudur?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: "Harika bir insandır! Çok düşünceli ve cömerttir... Tabii ki saygıdeğer yaşlılığı onu yıpratıyor. Zaman zaman garip davranıyor. Gelgelelim hepimizin tuhaflıkları yok mudur?"

languages.text: 「あぁ、彼は素晴らしい人です！とても思慮深く、寛大なお方です…が、もちろん、高齢のため否定的な影響もあります。総督は時々奇妙な振る舞いをします。でも、私たちはみんな癖を持っていますよね？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、彼は素晴らしい人です！とても思慮深く、寛大なお方です…が、もちろん、高齢のため否定的な影響もあります。総督は時々奇妙な振る舞いをします。でも、私たちはみんな癖を持っていますよね？」

languages.text: « Oh, c'est un homme formidable ! Il est si gentil, si généreux... même si, bien sûr, son âge avancé n'est pas sans conséquence. Il lui arrive parfois de se comporter de manière bien étrange. Mais nous avons tous nos petites manies, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, c'est un homme formidable ! Il est si gentil, si généreux... même si, bien sûr, son âge avancé n'est pas sans conséquence. Il lui arrive parfois de se comporter de manière bien étrange. Mais nous avons tous nos petites manies, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: "Oh, er ist ganz wunderbar! So freundlich und großzügig ... allerdings hat sein reifes Alter Spuren hinterlassen. Er verhält sich ab und an sonderbar. Aber wir haben schließlich alle unsere Eigenheiten, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, he is a wonderful person! So considerate and generous... but, of course, his venerable age has taken its toll. He behaves oddly from time to time. But we all have our quirks, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, er ist ganz wunderbar! So freundlich und großzügig ... allerdings hat sein reifes Alter Spuren hinterlassen. Er verhält sich ab und an sonderbar. Aber wir haben schließlich alle unsere Eigenheiten, nicht wahr?"
